showroom.address: Persiaran Sentral, Gerbang Nusajaya 79200 Iskandar Puteri Johor, Malaysia
showroom.operating_hours: Daily Operating Hours (including Public Holiday) Monday to Sunday​ 10am – 6pm

description: The final phase - Senadi Hills Phase 2B (Only 91 units) Spoiled with dreamy views from elevated grounds, Senadi Hills is a private enclave that welcomes all ages with wheelchair and stroller-friendly spaces provided to those in need. Beautiful manicured gardens and parks enrich Senadi Hills with natural touches of nature and greenery. Phase 2B is the final phase of double-storey terrace houses and offers a limited number of units with a lot size of 22’ x 70’ and a built-up area of 206m² (2,222 sq ft). These tastefully designed and guarded homes are built for all generations, ensuring ample and comfortable spaces for the whole family. Its strategic location also boasts a wealth of amenities and facilities — from schools, shopping centres to medical facilities and many more to fulfil your daily needs. Book Yours Now! Check out 360 Aerial View here
features: Wheelchair & Stroller Friendly Spaces And Pathways
Landscaped Gardens Just A Doorstep Away
Conveniently Located Alongside Lebuh Kota Iskandar And Coastal Highway
